full_summary:
# Industry Canada Invites Proposals for Portable Monitoring Receiver and Accessories

## Recent Amendments or Updates
None.

## Tender Details

### Scope
The Government of Canada invites vendors to submit proposals for Portable Monitoring Receiver and Accessories.

### Solicitation Reference Number
ISED205316

### Bid Due Date
The tender closes on 2022-12-02 at 13:00:00 Eastern Standard Time.

### Background
Industry Canada is seeking a Portable Monitoring Receiver and associated accessories.

### Technical Requirements
The proposed offer shall meet the requirements outlined in the Solicitation Document provided within the tender package.

### Estimated Requirement
2 units are required.

### Deliverables
The vendor shall deliver the Portable Monitoring Receiver and associated accessories to the end-user by 2022-12-05.

### Special Requirements
Wherever applicable, proponents are invited to propose in accordance with the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

## Potential Off-Set and Indigenous Opportunities
None.

## Trade Agreements
• Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
• Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
• Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
• Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
• Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
• Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
• World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
• Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
• Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
• Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Regions of Opportunity
Ontario (except National Capital Region).

## Regions of Delivery
Ontario (except National Capital Region).

## Evaluation Criteria
Selection will be based on the instructions outlined in the Solicitation Document.

## Request for Information
Contact: John Villeneuve
Email: [john.villeneuve@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:john.villeneuve@ised-isde.gc.ca)
Phone: 13435716760
Address: 235 Queen Street, Ottawa ON K1A0H5

## Tender Package
The tender package can be found at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/16/24bfb1678cdce0d475f729a2ac66c08f/ised205316-_e60hn-16elec_-_s
